text: Terence Baya (born 12 January 1998) is a French professional footballer who plays as leftback for Troyes. ==Professional career== Previously a professional with Brescia in the Italian Serie B, Baya moved to US Avranches in 2018. He then transferred to Troyes in 2019, signing a contract for three years. Baya made his professional debut with Troyes in a 2–0 Ligue 2 win over Chamois Niortais on 26 July 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * * USAMSM Profile Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Longjumeau Category:Association football fullbacks Category:French footballers Category:French people of Democratic Republic of the Congo descent Category:Troyes AC players Category:US Avranches players Category:Brescia Calcio players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National players Category:Championnat National 3 players
title: Terence Baya
